mapper.insert: insert into t_tfs_orgsub ( orgcode, orgname, userid, usertype, certificatetype, certificatenumber, mobiletel, `connect`, buslince, createTime) values (#{orgcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usertype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{certificatetype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{certificatenumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobiletel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{connect,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buslince,jdbcType=VARCHAR} #{createTime})
